name: Lauren h

text: I was babysitting and their parents ordered food for delivery so they could have it for lunch. It took over an hour for us to get it and I work at a different hungry howies and it looked like our food was sitting in the hot box for a while. ‚Ä¶More

text: The service just gets better and better at this location!!  The staff is always smiling and willing to help with any and all questions! The food is delicious and decently priced! Nothing like a hot, fresh pizza at a good price served with a friendly smile!! I never go anywhere else!
